        public static java.util.Properties getProperties(java.lang.String propertiesString)
        Method to get a property. This is to easily expand the set of preferences without having to provide a database attribute for each. The preferences are stored in the database in regular Java property format.

        propertiesString - the entire property string
        thePropertyName - name of property to get

      • setBooleanProperty

        public static void setBooleanProperty(java.util.Properties properties,
                      java.lang.String thePropertyName,
                      java.lang.Boolean thePropertyValue)
        Method to set a boolean property. This is to easily expand the set of preferences without having to provide a database attribute for each. The preferences are stored in the database in regular Java property format.
        Parameters:
        propertiesString - the entire property string
        thePropertyName - name of property
        thePropertyValue - value of property
